snippet: Thousands of men believe they have changed their most basic sexual desires through therapy and prayer, something most scientists say has never been proved possible.
abstract: Thousands of Christian men nationwide believe they have changed their homosexual desires through therapy and prayer, something most scientists say has never been proved possible.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of men believe they have changed their most basic sexual desires through therapy and prayer, something most scientists say has never been proved possible.

headline.seo: ‘Ex-Gay’ Men Fight View That Homosexuality Can’t Be Changed
headline.main: ‘Ex-Gay’ Men Fight Back Against View That Homosexuality Can’t Be Changed
headline.print_headline: ‘Ex-Gay’ Men Fight Back Against View That Homosexuality Can’t Be Changed
